entry.title: A Weary Destiny
entry.summary:
Author: EvelynsWorks

Summary: How can destiny be so cruel as to make someone who protects you also hates you? What kind of cruel thing did Arthur do in a past life to deserve the most powerful person hating him?Arthur has always hated the idea of destiny. His mother is a sorceress but his father isn’t, he instead, inherits his crown from his father.Merlin on the other hand, only knows his mother and she is a non magic user. She won’t tell him anything about his dad and now that he is going to go to hogwarts this year, he hopes he can get answers there. No matter what it takes.OrI had this idea from watching a TikTok that said Merlin would be in Slytherin. In reality, I think that he would most likely have a place in every house but in this, that is where the sorting hat will put him in and the teachers need to figure out what to do with Merlin and who’s care to put him under. In the end, they choose a second year student, Prince Arthur Pendragon.

entry.title: The Once Future King
entry.summary:
Author: sosi489

Summary: Arthur dies, but it isn’t over: the Sidhe offer him an opportunity to make it right again. Since he’s in the lake of Avalon, he cannot be fully declared dead, it’s like he’s floating between the gates of life and death. But Death has touched him, it’s not in their power to send him back to life. They can, though, send him back in time, to the other time he has been touched by Death. From the bite of the Questing beast. Arthur accepts the offer, and he wakes up in his bed, seeing his father sleeping by his sickbed.So I’ve seen fanfics where Merlin goes back, or when they both go back to the startline, but I just had the idea, what if it was Arthur burdened with the knowledge of the future, more than Merlin, because the poor boy deserves some break. And it was fun thinking about what decisions would Arthur make, if he had to do it all over again. For Arthur the Questing Beast was like five years ago or more, so he doesn’t fully remember everything, just main events. For example he remembers that the Lady Catrina was a troll, but he doesn’t remember that it was Cedric, who was possessed by Cornelius Sigan.Also, English is not my first language, so sorry if I make mistakes! I hope you enjoy.
